message.body: Hello!
hey
How are you today?
good had a long sunday with family. you?
I had a lovely day. Had brunch with a friend then went to an antique store
nice! i had brunch too i had a pancake stuffed w scramble eggs and spinach it was surprisingly delicious
Yum!!!! All the good tastes in one!
yea i know but did not expect it to be.
We didn't eat anything that exciting. Some pulled smoked chicken and roasted vegetables. It was delicious!
nice- love roasted vegs- been vegetarian for about 6 months now.
Wow! That's great. I don't eat nearly much meat now as I grew up eating, but not sure I could go total vegetarian.
that's how i was for years too mostly vegetarian thought i could never go total v but i love it
Are there any veggies you totally hate?
not really sometimes grape tomatoes are not my favourite. i have become quite picky about having only the best quality vegetables
now being veg i can taste the difference between a farm fresh vegs and crapy ones
You are British? I see the was you spell favourite. I am not a fan much of eggplant. But I'll eat pretty much anything else
haha not british. originally from portugal english is my 2nd language.
Ah! Very cool! I have wanted to go to Portugal for a long time now. Seems like such a beautiful place!
I LOVE EGGPLANT! there so many amazing things you can do with it.
See I feel that way about Brussels sprouts and broccoli! I love them so much!
yea it is a beautiful little place going there with my husband and son this summer cant wait to show my little bundle off
i love those too.
Yum! How old is your son?
think it will be hard to stay veg in portugal! my family already thinks its so odd
9 months
Awwww so sweet! Congrats!
thanks he is a happy little budha baby.
good morning
Good morning! Happy Monday :)
Getting a pedi :) hubby is with baby at home. Monday mornings are my me time. What are you up to?
Well I took the day off work, so was thinking about running a few errands. Haven't been to the grocery store in so long!!!
likewise just went grocery too it had been forever.
what do you do?
I'm an infectious disease epidemiologist. I work at CDC. It sounds way more interesting than it is :)
wow it sounds really interesting what did you study in school
